page.title: 13AGRICULTURAL SERVICES N.TYNE
page.content: Hutchinsons Drainage firm is based at Whitewall Nook and does most of the {draining}in the area, the majority of this is for reclamation of moorland. This firm provides upwards of eight jobs for local men. Other contracting is done by farms who contract as a sideline - a{haulage business}from Shillafield, Lee Hall farm does a lot of the{silage work}for neighbouring farms providing 8-10 jobs on a casual basis for 4-5 weeks in the silage season. They also own a combine and contract out to farmers who usually only have between ten and twenty acres of grain. There are also several men in the area who work casually doing jobs such as{dry stone walling,} shearing and harvest work. Few farms can afford full time labour and rely on these "casuals".
